clearcontrol.core.variable

Class Variable<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcontrol.core.variable.VariableBase<O>
      • clearcontrol.core.variable.Variable<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    VariableGetInterface<O>, VariableSetInterface<O>, VariableSyncInterface<O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoundedVariable, CleanupStackVariable, DoubleVariableAsFile, EnableVariable, HomingVariable, MaxPositionVariable, MinPositionVariable, PositionCurrentVariable, PositionTargetVariable, ReadyVariable, ResetVariable, SingleUpdateTargetVariable, StopVariable, TSTBooleanVariableBase, TSTDoubleVariableBase, VariableAsFile

    public class Variable<O>
extends VariableBase<O>
implements VariableSyncInterface<O>, VariableSetInterface<O>, VariableGetInterface<O>
    Variable. variable can be used to hold references, listen to changes of these values, and can be synced with each other among other things. equals and hascode are determined solely based on the variable name, not the reference it holds.
    Author:
    royer

    • Field Summary

      void decrement()
      Decrements the value by 1 (only works for numeric types)

        public void toggle()
        Toggles the value, fou double it simply changes the sign, for boolean values it toggles between false and true.

      • sync

        public void sync(O pNewValue,
                 boolean pClearEventQueue)
        Sends a new value to the variables synced to this variable - this is normally called internally when setting the value. This should be only used if you know what you are doing...
        Parameters:
        pNewValue - new value to send
        pClearEventQueue - true -> clears event queue

      • setEventHook

        public O setEventHook(O pOldReference,
                      O pNewReference)
        Set event hook, can be overridden by a derived class to intercept set eventsand modify teh set value before it is propagated.
        Parameters:
        pOldReference - old value
        pNewReference - new value
        Returns:
        possibly modified new value

        Returns:
